source.name: Exporter Database
source.description: This tool provides a statistical overview and tables outlining the export activities of U.S. small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), which are defined as firms that have fewer than 500 employees. All figures in this overview and tables include only identifiable or "known" exports, i.e., exports that can be linked to individual companies using information on U.S. export declarations.
